name: Oven-roasted Tomato Bruschetta

ingredients.name: Bruschetta Seasoning or Rosemary Garlic Seasoning
Herb & Garlic Dip or 3 Onion Dip

preparation: Place baguette slices on parchment-lined Sheet Pan. Brush with 1 tbsp oil mixed with Seasoning. Bake for 5–8 minutes, turning once, until lightly toasted.
Spread tomatoes in a single layer on a separate parchment-lined Sheet Pan. Season with Salt and Pepper. Drizzle with remaining oil.
Bake for 20 minutes, until soft and slightly shriveled. Set aside to cool.
Spread Herb & Garlic Dip over each toast. Top with tomatoes and serve warm or at room temperature
